## Recipe draft checklist
- [ ] Drafts live under `recipes/` and include MkDocs frontmatter
- [ ] Images live under `assets/images/` or trusted HTTPS URLs
- [ ] OpenClaw ingest script used (scripts/ingest_openclaw_updates.py) or manual edits documented

## Security & outbound check (required)
- [ ] Metadata sanitized (no hidden links, HTML, or unsanctioned fields)
- [ ] Lethal-trifecta guard applied for outbound text (no model-invented claims/URLs)
- [ ] Human review completed before publish
- [ ] If AI assisted, model noted (openai-codex/gpt-5.2)
